definition: to change shape in a single shake/fig. to take on a new lease of life
surname Yao
to shake/to rock/to row/to crank
body/life/oneself/personally/one's morality and conduct/the main part of a structure or body/pregnant/classifier for sets of clothes: suit, twinset/Kangxi radical 158
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
to change/to become different/to transform/to vary/rebellion

sentences.english: What starts as criticism of the foreign can quickly swing to domestic targets.
sentences.chinese: 对于外国的批判可以很快摇身一变指向内部的目标。

sentences.english: Reno has turned itself into a distribution hub.
sentences.chinese: 如雷诺市已经摇身一变成为了集散中心。

sentences.english: The boring office guy transforms into a passionate lover of giving oral sex.
sentences.chinese: 无趣的公司职员摇身一变成了口技了得的情场浪子。

definition: lit. to shake one's body/refers to abrupt transformation/same as 搖身一變|摇身一变

a best-seller/a hot property
to sink down to/to be reduced to (sth inferior)
